books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Cross takes on a case even though he has been suspended from the department and taken to federal court to stand trial on murder charges.
books.name: THE PEOPLE VS. ALEX CROSS

books.author: by Michael Connelly
books.description: While he investigates the murder of two pharmacists, an old case comes back to haunt Harry Bosch.
books.name: TWO KINDS OF TRUTH

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: A symbology professor goes on a perilous quest with a beautiful museum director.
books.name: ORIGIN

books.author: by Robert Crais
books.description: A single mother hires Elvis Cole to investigate her teenage son who is on the run after a deadly crime spree.
books.name: THE WANTED

books.author: by Helen Hardt
books.description: The eighth book in the Steel Brothers Saga series.
books.name: TWISTED

books.author: by E.L. James
books.description: Christian Grey's tormented and difficult pursuit of Anastasia Steele is told from his perspective.
books.name: DARKER

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: Three students at a sleazy for-profit law school hope to expose the student-loan banker who runs it.
books.name: THE ROOSTER BAR

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: A new collection of poetry from the author of "Milk and Honey."
books.name: THE SUN AND HER FLOWERS

books.author: by Kate Quinn
books.description: A pregnant American college student and a French spy join together on a mission in London in 1947.
books.name: THE ALICE NETWORK

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Lee Child
books.description: Jack Reacher tracks down the owner of a pawned West Point class ring and stumbles upon a large criminal enterprise.
books.name: THE MIDNIGHT LINE

books.author: by Celeste Ng
books.description: An artist upends a quiet town outside Cleveland.
books.name: LITTLE FIRES EVERYWHERE

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: Jessica Reel and Will Robie fight a dangerous adversary in Colorado.
books.name: END GAME

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: When a pandemic strikes and the world spins into chaos, several travelers head west to find a new life.
books.name: YEAR ONE

books.author: by Karin Slaughter
books.description: The lawyer Charlotte Quinn is challenged when violence returns to her hometown of Pikesville.
books.name: THE GOOD DAUGHTER
